TopicTitle: Make a wish... and have it horribly corrupted!

Articles.Content:
granted but the boosters explode horribly and cause the game to crash on startup forever

i wish i was a dalek

Granted but your weapons are removed and your going insane on the Dalek Asylum.

I wish I was a Falcon ( the bird )

granted but you are in a zoo of horribly handycapped zalcons

I wish i had complete control of the world

Granted, but you had complete control of the world for one Planck time, so you could not process your powers fast enough. Roughly 10 exponentÃ¢Ë†â€™43 seconds.

I wish for Jool to be compressed so it can fit in my hand.

Edited October 7, 2012 by lordpie

The gravitational pull of Jool crushes you instantly.

I wish that Magic and Miracles are real*.

*Anime Reference, see if you can figure out which one?

Granted, but then a witch would use her powers to make you a toad, and for miracles, well, you would have to wait longer than your lifespan to have one.

I wish for a 100 capacity cockpit that has IVA's, and EVA's built in.

granted beut the cockpit lags so bad that it make your computer cause a black hole

i wish i was the first man on mars

granted but no eva suit. YOU DEAD FOOL!

i wish i was a dalek.

granted but you are a dalek that came from a human genetic chane so you hate your own existence and you are supremely insane

i wish i was an amasing person who flew around the universe in a TARDIS, and was a timelord

Granted, but you have no control of where and when your going (psssst, the sun)

I wish for a sunset.

Edited October 8, 2012 by lucidLemon

granted only when it sets it sets for the last time meaning that the planet you are on begins orbiting like the moon, as in the dark side of tthe planet stays dark so you get trapped there forever and freeze

edit: wish i had a wish

Edited October 8, 2012 by zapy97

Where's the wish?

I wish for faster internet.

granted but you internet is so fast everyone get jealious and come to kill you for your internet

i wish people would read my last edit faster

Granted but they are all insane so the edit means nothing.

i all the timelords were not dead anymore

Edited October 8, 2012 by Festivefire

granted but they begin the final sanction and destroy all reality

i wish the cult of skarro was still around

granted but all the new members suck at runescape and troll endlessly

i wish for turkey

granted but it is poisened so you die a few minute later

i wish that i had a realife dalek that did my biding

Granted, but it is trained to assassinate it's owner.

I wish for the answers for my next test.

Granted, but the test wasn't for a grade.

I wish they would make a realistic space horror movie.

Granted. Its about the ISS, the Earth gets bored with it and stops sending up supplies. The commode breaks again, the air pumps degrade and by the time it's heading down for a destructive re-entry the astronauts are dehydrated, hungry and drowning in their own filth. Overall the movie makes you sick and hate your species.

I wish for the fastest computer in the world.

Granted, but the outside is made of dust so it screws up the internals of the machine permanently, and you have to pay tax on the useless machine for over 9,000 years.

I wish for the genetic code that belongs to the giant cockroach in MIB.

Granted, but it gets released one night and everybody in the world is trying to download it at the same time from some dusty old server at Squad, and your download gets interrupted over and over forever.

I wish for a flawless theory of the functioning of the human brain.
Granted, unfortunately the moment you get it your head is hit several times with a large pan.

Granted, but all of reality folds in on itself

I wish for reality to unfold itself.

Granted but it unfolds you with it.

I wish black holes were friendly.
